duties_responsibilities.duty: Own the requirements analysis process and contribute to the success of Server-Side Ad Insertions platform.
Work closely with stakeholders to understand new features and initiatives, and break down requirements into user stories.
Prepare and facilitate planning sessions based on the product roadmap and support the team in delivering high-impact work with optimal user experience.
Contribute to ensuring resilient and reliable integrations of the video player with other Peacock components.
Facilitate estimation sessions with the team to obtain high-level roadmap estimates and RAID logs.
Promote an inclusive team culture and commitment to quality in every assignment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
